tool_description: Extracts text from invoice images using OCR technology, preserving spatial coordinates and confidence levels for each text element.

image_path.description: Path to the invoice image file

ocr_engine.description: OCR engine to use: tesseract, azure, aws

preserve_layout.description: Whether to maintain spatial text positioning

error_messages: Image file not accessible: Ensure image_path points to a valid, readable file
Unsupported language code: Use standard ISO language codes (en, es, fr, de, etc.)
Invalid OCR engine: Choose from tesseract, azure, or aws
OCR processing failed: Image may be corrupted or unreadable, try preprocessing first
usage: Provide image_path and optionally specify language, ocr_engine, and preserve_layout settings. Returns extracted text with spatial information.

extracted_text.description: Complete text content from the invoice

text_blocks.description: Individual text blocks with spatial coordinates

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each text block (0-100)

overall_confidence.description: Average confidence score for entire extraction
